backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing a map of history entries with CRUD, filtering, and conversion helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting title, favicon, root div, and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring tabs, global state, React Query, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary component capturing runtime errors and offering reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component handling Excel file replacement, reset actions, and upload validation with hidden file input.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer with styling.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Scrollable preview table rendering sheet headers and rows with empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar for filtering update‑checking results with keyword input, match‑type selector, and clear button.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and plays step‑by‑step VLOOKUP animation based on sheet data and search parameters with playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, login state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for listing, adding, and clearing backend history entries with conversions between frontend and backend formats.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with global element styling.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Provides functions to compare two Excel sheets by key, row, or column and returns structured diff results.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword using exact or contains matching across key and cell values.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Generates deterministic row signatures and aligns old rows to new header order for comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Normalizes Excel headers and finds header indices using trimmed, comparable strings.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses Excel files into sheet data with headers and rows.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines branding config and utilities to load logos as base64 or Image elements for exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Loads jsPDF and renders branded, multi-page PDF exports with optional watermarking.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Loads SheetJS from CDN and exports data arrays to a branded Excel file.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Defines static header and footer company info used for PDF branding.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP and multi-VLOOKUP operations on sheet data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays search/filter history with options to clear and export items to Excel or PDF.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Shows VLOOKUP and update-checking results, supports row editing and export of updated workbook.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides VLOOKUP and filter search UI and executes multi-value searches with export options.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Handles uploading, parsing, and comparing two Excel workbooks to detect updates.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: React component handling Excel upload, parsing, validation, sheet selection, and updating global workbook state.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state types and context for workbook data, search/filter parameters, update-checking, history, and state mutators.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, required features, and known issues for Crystal Atlas.
